::Hot Rod::

"Prime!"
He ran to the now dead body of Optimus Prime. His mind drifting back to
the time he first saw this. In the med bay at Autobot City. Prime had
said not to grieve, that he would be one with the Matrix. Hot Rod
looked, the Matrix was gone as well.
"Rest in piece, prime. Vehical mode."
He transformes to car mode, and heads back to the CF.
